collectible.title: A Stolen Scouter
collectible.subtitle: Blowing up since the nineties.
collectible.text: "Hey there! It's me, Caulifla. I got my hands on a box of these old things since I last saw ya. Man, I haven't seen any of these in ages! You were saying that you can't sense energy, so I figured this could come in handy. And hey, why don't ya call me sometime? We'll hit up that inventory place again if we're both in the area. Catch ya later!"
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Caulifla to unlock this collectable (you don't need to win, she just needs to lose).

collectible.title: Super Saiyan 4
collectible.subtitle: A Saiyan connected to their primal roots.
collectible.text: "Son of a bitch! Why'd no one tell me this would make me lose my top?! Ugh! That crap aside, I wanted to thank ya. I've been working hard for a wild transformation like this, and you've given me the inspiration I needed to attain this awesome power! I'm gonna kick Goku's ass for sure next time we meet! And it's all thanks to you, buddy!"
collectible.unlock: A Saiyan gets stronger every time they're defeated, and you've defeated Caulifla four times in battle, unlocking the Super Saiyan 4 achievement as a result.
